file_insights.changes: Major update with new translations for Serverless, Jobs, Models, and Documentation pages
Spanish translation mirror of English translations

patterns_discovered: Detailed translations for different application pages
Use of template variables like {{count}} and {{amount}}
Comprehensive error and status message translations
gotchas_discovered: Complex translation structure with nested JSON objects
Ensuring consistent message and UI terminology between languages
recommendations: Use translation management tools to track changes
Create a style guide for maintaining consistent translations
Consider using professional translation services for complex technical terms
